message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. Would you be open to $85?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $87 for the product, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
